name: Bad Skeleton & the Time Police
description:
🐢   The game seems to run a bit slowly in Safari. Sorry about that, stick to Chrome for now and I'll fix it later.

Bad Skeleton has obtained a prohibited time machine device. It must be terminated.
Made for Ludum Dare 47 (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/bad-skeleton-the-time-police)

How to play

🕹    WASD to move, mouse to shoot.

The timeline will repeat after you have fired all 6 bullets.

⚠️    Do not shoot your past self.
⚠️    Do not get shot BY your past self.
⚠️    Party Skeleton exists outside of time and will not repeat across timelines. Be careful when you shoot it as it will no longer be there to stop the bullet in future timelines. And the bullet might continue on to hit another version of yourself.
